text:
June 12, 1957
Dr# Burton Paulu
Station K0OM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis, Minnesota
Dear Burt:
I'm inclined to think that, however I might personally feel about
this, doing a pcro-toll-TV article as or while Executive Director
of the NAEB would be poor policy. Do you agree?
Sincerely,
Harry J# Skornia
Executive Director
HJS/dfc
GCj Prank E# Schooley
Enclosure
